Challenges of Traditional Print Comics

Print comics require readers

  • ...to have physical access to the medium (e.g. book store)
  • ...deal with portability concerns
  • ...be sighted

## Challenges of Traditional Print Comics

Print comics require readers

  • ...to have physical access to the medium (e.g. book store)
  • ...deal with portability concerns
  • ...be sighted
